name: Workforce Development
description: These services are in transition - call MNC directly to know the latest on workforce development. In the past, workforce development offerings have targeted youth and unemployed or underemployed adults. The programs offer a variety of work, experience, development, training, and education. Included: Year Round Program: MNC's year-round program provides services to young and older adults who reside in San Francisco. Participants receive support in: - Job training - Workforce development - Securin
